  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">All the Way to Timbuktu - Uncovering Mali's Historic Legacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vollständig zu Timbuktu - Freilegen Malis von von
historischer Legacy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Toute la voie à Timbuktu - découvrement du legs 
historique du Mali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Toda a maneira a Timbuktu - descobrindo o legacy 
historic de Mali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tutto il modo a Timbuktu - scoprire l'eredità 
storica del Mali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλος ο τρόπος σε Timbuktu - που αποκαλύπτει την 
ιστορική κληρονομιά του Μαλί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Toda la manera a Timbuktu - destapadura de la 
herencia histórica de Malí</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students learn about historic preservation efforts in Timbuktu, Mali, and about the city�s past as �the intellectual heart of Africa.� They then research various events related to the city�s history to create oral presentations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erlernen Kursteilnehmer über 
historische Bewahrungbemühungen in Timbuktu, Mali und über die 
city?s hinter als?the intellektuelles Inneres von Afrika? Sie 
erforschen dann die verschiedenen Fälle, die auf der city?s 
Geschichte in Verbindung gestanden werden, um Munddarstellungen zu 
erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants se renseignent 
au sujet des efforts historiques de conservation dans Timbuktu, Mali, 
et sur les city?s après comme le coeur intellectuel de ?the de 
l'Afrique ? Ils recherchent alors de divers événements liés 
à l'histoire de city?s pour créer des présentations orales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes aprendem sobre 
esforços historic da preservação em Timbuktu, Mali, e sobre os 
city?s após como o coração intelectual do?the de África? 
Pesquisam então os vários eventos relacionados ao history dos 
city?s para criar apresentações orais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi imparano circa gli 
sforzi storici di conservazione in Timbuktu, Mali e circa i city?s 
oltre come cuore intellettuale del?the dell'Africa? Allora 
ricercano i vari eventi relativi alla storia dei city?s per creare le 
presentazioni orali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τις 
ιστορικές προσπάθειες συντήρησης σε Timbuktu, Μαλί, και για το 
παρελθόν city?s ως διανοητική καρδιά ?the της Αφρικής; 
Ερευνούν έπειτα τα διάφορα γεγονότα σχετικά με την ιστορία
city?s για να δημιουργήσουν τις προφορικές παρουσιάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿En esta lección, los estudiantes aprenden sobre 
esfuerzos históricos de la preservación en Timbuktu, Malí, y sobre 
los city?s más allá como de corazón intelectual del?the de África?
Entonces investigan los varios acontecimientos relacionados con 
la historia de los city?s para crear presentaciones orales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
